_source.text: Adam Kalmbach, the man behind the Jute Gyte name almost always manages to describe his music far better than I can, and the couple of lines which accompany Senescence are no exception.

_source.text: A few lines why you think this is important are better than cutting and pasting a long explanation from some website.
